Title: Gintama the Movie: The Final Chapter - Be Forever Yorozuya
Writer: Hideaki Sorachi (manga), Hideaki Sorachi (story), Akatsuki Yamatoya (screenplay)
Actors: Tomokazu Sugita, Daisuke Sakaguchi, Rie Kugimiya, Tsutomu Isobe
Plot: Gintoki travels into the future and discovers it to be a wasteland with his friends fallen apart. He reunites them to find out what went wrong and how to fix things.
